description: Gaunson Creative Studios in South Tottenham, home to over 70 artist studios, will be opening its doors for the first time since 2019. Visitors will be able to meet and buy from over 50 artists across the weekend.

events.name: Drop in: Markfield Road Festival - Saturday
Drop in: Markfield Road Festival - Sunday
events.notes:
Please let us know if you plan to visit. Doing so allows
                    the venue to plan ahead and you will be notified by email
                    about any changes to the programme that might affect your
                    visit.

facilities: Handrails on both sides of stairs
Handrails on one side of stairs

factsheet.heading: Gaunson Creative Open Studios
paragraphs: Gaunson Creative Open Studios will be organising free, three-day Markfield Road Festival celebrating creatives, on 13 - 14 September 2025, on Markfield Road in South Tottenham. Over 70 artists will open their studio doors to the public to showcase and sell their work.

We’re looking forward to welcoming art lovers to see behind the scenes and find out about our resident artist’s practices across ceramics, painting, film, illustration, design, fashion, photography, music and more.

factsheet.heading: Festival activities
paragraphs: The car park in front of the building will be transformed into Art In The Yard - a space for installations by some of our resident artists. You can join in other activities from the festival including an art raffle, panel discussions, film screenings, live music, DJs, food and drink. There will be activities for the whole family to enjoy with children’s workshops, face painting and a carnival procession organised by a local primary school.

factsheet.heading: Times and extra information
paragraphs:
Markfield Road Festival will be open
Saturday 13th September, 2pm - 11pm
Sunday 14th September, 2pm - 9pm

Gaunson Creative Open Studios will open during these specific times:
Saturday 13th September, 2pm - 6pm
Sunday 14th September, 2pm - 6pm

location.address: Gaunson Creative Studios, Gunson House, Markfield Road, N15 4QQ
travel_info: Train: Seven Sisters, South Tottenham, Tottenham Hale

name: Gaunson Creative Open Studios part of Markfield Road Festival
